Detailed Description

template<std::size_t numOfRandoms>
class SimpleCalc3< numOfRandoms >

Author:
Simon Wicks <simonw@phys.columbia.edu> Example class to implement the necessary calculation interface to the driver class. Whatever the coordinates supplied in the deterministic dimensions it just returns the number of random numbers supplied.
Implementation of other calculations can be based off this interface.
